definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to handle a situation according to the circumstances (idiom)
conducting business impartially (idiom); to act justly
to act after full consideration of the actual situation

sentences.english: The strengthening of Ji'nan awning construction site for electricity.
sentences.chinese: 加強濟南遮陽蓬施工現場的用電辦理。

sentences.english: AF Flight No.123 is checking in at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 法航123號航班正在辦理登機手續。

sentences.english: Ms. Lambert handles all our closures.
sentences.chinese: 銷戶是由蘭伯特女士辦理的。

sentences.english: The banks can handle foreign exchange purchase for official foreign visit groups.
sentences.chinese: 銀行可按當日牌價爲您辦理人民幣與外幣的兌換。

sentences.english: registration with the people's armed forces departments at the county level.
sentences.chinese: 縣人民武裝部辦理預備役軍官登記。

sentences.english: Sex one-inch colour photos of the students are needed.
sentences.chinese: 需辦理接送卡的學生交家長一寸相片2張。

sentences.english: This law also applies if the bull gores a son or daughter.
sentences.chinese: 牛無論觸了人的兒子或是女兒，必照這例辦理。

sentences.english: They are related in many ways and need to be managed in a holistic approach.
sentences.chinese: 她們之間在品牌辦理的好些個方面上具備接洽瓜葛性。

sentences.english: After receiving the notice, we will provide you with relevant formalities.
sentences.chinese: 收到包裹單後，我們將爲您辦理相關手續。

sentences.english: If you need to add or drop a class, please come to the office to see Ms Lu.
sentences.chinese: 需要辦理加退選的家長請到辦公室找呂惠中。

sentences.english: How to handle “the ratification of foreigners' travel to Tibet”?
sentences.chinese: 如何辦理“外國人入藏旅遊批准函”？

sentences.english: The OCOG may establish a functional area dealing with Recruitment aspects.
sentences.chinese: 組委會可以設立專門的職能部門辦理招聘有關事宜。

sentences.english: If the above situation does not, you can apply to telecommunications.
sentences.chinese: 如果上面情況沒有，也可以去電信局辦理。

sentences.english: Eligible people can purchase with invoices and apply for this room.
sentences.chinese: 符合條件的人可以帶着購房發票和房本申請辦理。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I might apply for an import licence?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我在哪兒辦理申請進口執照嗎？

sentences.english: I am 22 years old, the need for old-age insurance?
sentences.chinese: 我今年22歲，需要辦理養老保險嗎？

definition: variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
